title: Were Humans Created by God or Aliens? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/18/20
itunes:title: Were Humans Created by God or Aliens? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/18/20
description:
George Noory and author Paul Wallis explore his interpretation of stories from the Old Testament of the Bible, and how he believes they show that humans in the Garden of Eden were created by aliens and not God.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
